modName: Frost Atronach Dirty Fix 2 - for Seasons of Skyrim
summary: Restores Frost Atronachs if they are removed by other mods
descriptionHtml:
This is the second version of my mod which restores frost atronachs to a game when they've been removed from another mod

I made this mod specifically because of Seasons of Skyrim Summer Edition which removes Frost Atronachs

It was recently brought to my attention that I left Climates of Tamriel as a dependency because of the SoSP Summer Edition â€“ Co T Patch. If you had a CTD from this mod it should be fixed now

Essentially this mod just marks the important frost atronach settings as changes even though no changes were made. So if you load Seasons of Skyrim Summer first then this mod you will still have frost atronachs in your game

So, for me
....
Seasons of Skyrim Project.esp
SoSP Summer Edition.esp
SoSP Summer Edition - Co T Patch.esp
SoSP Summer Edition - Dense Grass.esp
SummerFrostAtronachDirtyFix.esp
...

PM me if you have a problem;
I also left comments open this time
author: groea
